content.query:
SELECT * FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://abdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/ffs/Transformed Datasets/2019.csvd31086f2-e300-49f5-aa5a-30a040c40229/part-00000-94cb97f2-be53-4025-a037-59a41141ebeb-c000.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"'
        
    ) WITH(
    [id] bigint,
	[name] nvarchar(4000) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
	[host_id] bigint,
	[host_name] nvarchar(4000) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
	[neighbourhood_group] nvarchar(4000) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
	[neighbourhood] nvarchar(4000) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[room_type] nvarchar(4000) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
	[price] bigint,
	[minimum_nights] bigint,
	[number_of_reviews] bigint,
	[calculated_host_listings_count] bigint,
	[availability_365] bigint
    )AS [result]
